## Feature Description
What enhancement would you like to see?

## Current Behavior
How does it work now?

## Proposed Behavior
How should it work?

## Affected Example
Which example would this improve?
- Path: (e.g., `api/rest/applicants/fetch-all/python`)

## Benefits
Why would this improvement be valuable?

## Implementation Ideas
Any suggestions on how to implement this?

## Additional Context
Any other relevant information or examples from other projects.
